statements: UPDATE inventory SET stock_level = 50, price = 15.99 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE inventory SET price = 12.50, stock_level = 75 WHERE item_id = 202;
UPDATE inventory SET price = 15.99, stock_level = stock_level + 5 WHERE item_id = 123
UPDATE inventory SET stock_level = 20, price = 9.99 WHERE item_name = 'Chair'
UPDATE inventory_items SET item_name = 'Updated Item 1', quantity = 100 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE stock_levels SET stock_quantity = 50 WHERE warehouse_id = 1 AND item_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_items SET quantity = quantity + 10, price = price * 1.1 WHERE item_id = 123;
UPDATE stock_levels SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity - 5 WHERE item_id = 456 AND warehouse_id = 789;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE product_name = 'Apple';
UPDATE transactions SET total_amount = 500.75, quantity_sold = 5 WHERE transaction_id = 3;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 5, price = price * 1.1 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET quantity_sold = quantity_sold + 2, total_amount = total_amount + 15.50 WHERE transaction_id = 3;
UPDATE digital_goods SET price = 20.99, category = 'Electronics' WHERE digital_goods_id = 101;
UPDATE stock_levels SET quantity = 50, last_updated = '2022-08-15 10:30:00' WHERE stock_level_id = 201;
UPDATE digital_goods SET price = 25.99 WHERE digital_goods_id = 100
UPDATE stock_levels SET quantity = quantity - 1, last_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE digital_goods_id = 200
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 20, price = 150.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET contact_number = '+1234567890' WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = 100, price = 25.99 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET quantity_changed = quantity_changed + 5, transaction_type = 'Sale' WHERE id = 3;
